io.minAR.core

Class Analyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.minAR.core.Analyzer

  • public class Analyzer
extends java.lang.Object
    Core class, involved in the creation of internal file trees, reading of data from the files and outputing the archive
    Since:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    nikhil

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Analyzer(java.io.File dir, boolean COMPRESSED, boolean ENCRYPTED)
      Generates an internal file tree, from which is then filled with actual data of the files Excludes empty directories

    • Constructor Detail

      • Analyzer

        public Analyzer(java.io.File dir,
                boolean COMPRESSED,
                boolean ENCRYPTED)
        Generates an internal file tree, from which is then filled with actual data of the files Excludes empty directories
        Parameters:
        dir - The directory whose contents are to be compressed
        COMPRESSED - whether the archive is compressed or not; xz compression applicable
        ENCRYPTED - whether the archive is encrypted or not; if so, then a random key is generated and will be notified.
        See Also:
        Compressor, Crypt

    • Method Detail

      • test

        protected void test()
        A test function to traverse through and print all the nodes by calling Node.toString()

      • convertToDataTree

        public void convertToDataTree()
        Traverse through the internal file tree and fill in the actual data in the corresponding files.

      • OUTPUT_minAR

        public void OUTPUT_minAR(java.lang.String file)
        Finally, output the archive onto the file. The file tree is serialized into bytes, encrypted and written into the file
        Parameters:
        file - the archive file
        See Also:
        Serializer, Crypt

      • instance

        protected static Analyzer instance(NodeTree<java.io.File> filetree,
                                   boolean COMPRESSED,
                                   boolean ENCRYPTED)
        A reserved initializer, for internal purpose only.
        See Also:
        Extractor

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
